alert.note: Alert for Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued January 12 at 4:38AM MST until January 13 at 1:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM PST THIS MORNING... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST SATURDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 4 AM PST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional snow accumulations up to one inch. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Moscow, Plummer, Genesee, and Potlatch. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 10 AM PST this morning. For the Wind Chill Warning, until noon PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road information in Idaho, call 5 1 1. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
